QuestData.Title: Firebeard's Patrol
QuestData.Description: I was on my way to join Firebeard's Patrol when my bird was shot down.$B$BTwilight's Hammer launched surprise attacks all over the Highlands. Sometimes their buildings crawled right out of the earth in the middle of our villages. It was a nightmare!$B$BIn the chaos, Firebeard is one of the few who's kept his head on straight. He's trying to piece together a full gryphon wing from the survivors.$B$BIf you want to bring the Wildhammer into the Alliance, start by helping out Firebeard, to the west.
QuestData.LogDescription: Seek out Keegan Firebeard at Firebeard's Patrol in Twilight Highlands.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Seek out Keegan Firebeard at Firebeard's Patrol in Twilight Highlands.
QuestData.RewardText: Come to join the patrol, $glad:lass;? Glad to have ya.$B$BI need some bodies helpin' to get our defenses under control here. Help me out and I'll see if I can't find some more prestigious work for ya.
